name: Real BaseBall World Champion 3D
description:
Team up to build your roster and dominate the World Baseball League, Play like the pros with stunning 3D graphics!
Enjoy the ultimate real Baseball League experience.
Play Real BaseBall World Champion 3D
- Play with teams and players from Real BaseBall World Champion 3D
- Tap to swing with easy one-touch controls, anytime and anywhere
- Enhanced graphics brings the American Baseball League experience to life


Hit monster home runs and get crowned as your favorite baseball stars! Throw fastball, changeup, curveball or slider to get the hitters out! Steal bases, bunt, pinch-hit or bring in a reliever – it’s all your
call! Choose your strategy wisely and outsmart your opponent in the major league! Create your own unique dream team and put them into real test. Hop into a quick match or dive into a full season to win the
world series championship now!

Real BaseBall World Champion 3D Features:
- Easy one-touch controls and authentic 3D graphics
- Full team customization allowing you to create your own fantasy team with 700 players
- Always accessible: 3 innings, 6 innings and 9 innings
